Mamma Mia! (2008) is a fun and upbeat musical that features a soundtrack of ABBA songs, as well as an all-star cast including Meryl Streep, Amanda Seyfried, and Pierce Brosnan. It's a great choice if you're looking for a lighthearted and entertaining movie with catchy music.

The Greatest Showman (2017) is another musical that has been gaining popularity in recent years. It stars Hugh Jackman as P.T. Barnum, a showman who creates a circus that becomes a sensation in 19th century America. The movie features original songs by Benj Pasek and Justin Paul, and its lively soundtrack has made it a favorite among many music fans. I think you'll enjoy it!
